name: Duality Dilemma [Global Game Jam LV 2022 game]
name_original: Duality Dilemma [Global Game Jam LV 2022 game]
description:
I tried to make a game during GGJ, but RL stuff got in the way, so this is what I got.. It's not really a "game" at this stage (there aren't really any choices), but the original idea was:

  • Simple story game with almost no visuals except text and a few buttons about seemingly everyday choices of an average person.
  • “TellTale” style dialogue options
  • At the end of the game you’ll see how many % of players chose the dialogue options you chose
  • My goal is that it’s about 50/50 on what dialogue options people choose

Game engine: Godot Code: Jānis Skuja and a snippet from https://godotengine.org/qa/57130/how-to-import-and-read-text Story: Jānis Skuja

Assets:
Game Icons were taken from https://game-icons.net/
Font used: https://fonts.google.com/specimen/Roboto
Ambient background music for trailer video: https://opengameart.org/content/dark-ambience-0

Download source at: https://github.com/skuja-studio/duality_dilemma
